definition[0]: if a group or organization affiliates to or with another larger one, it forms a close connection with it
example[0]: The Society is not affiliated with any political party.
example[1]: the church’s right to affiliate to Rome
explanation[0]: Affiliate  is usually passive in this meaning, when used as a transitive verb
definition[1]: a company, organization etc that is connected with or controlled by a larger one
definition[2]: a small company or organization that is connected with or controlled by a larger one
example[3]: Fuji Xerox Co., the Japanese affiliate of Xerox Corp
definition[3]: if a group or organization affiliates to or is affiliated to a larger one, it is connected with it or controlled by it
example[4]: The company is affiliated to the giant Sumitomo group.
example[5]: Student associations almost all affiliate to the National Union of Students.
